title: Microfibre Cloth Roll - Pack of 50, Easy Tear-Off Design, Lint Free Cloth, Super Absorbent, Very Soft Cleaning Cloths for Home, Kitchen, Office, Electronics, Car Cleaning - 30cm x 30cm
availability_text: Only 3 left in stock (more on the way).
features: Pack of 50 Microfibre Cleaning Cloths - Our microfibre cleaning cloths come in a convenient roll of 50 sheets, each measuring 30cm x 30cm. Ideal for a variety of tasks, these cloths are perfect for home, kitchen, office, and car detailing.

100% Microfibre Composition - Crafted from premium microfibre, these microfiber cloths ensure superior absorbency and durability. These microfibre cloths are perfect for car cleaning, offering a lint-free finish for a spotless shine.

Easy Tear-Off Sheet Feature - Each microfibre cloth car cleaning sheet features an easy tear-off design, ensuring you always have the right size for any task. The compact roll design makes it convenient to store and transport.

Super Absorbent & Reusable - Our microfibre cloths are not only super absorbent but also reusable, making them an eco-friendly option for kitchen cloths, car cleaning cloths, and all-purpose cleaning cloths for home.

Versatile for Multiple Uses - Whether you need a kitchen cloth for cleaning, a microfibre cloth for car maintenance, or a polishing cloth for electronics, these micro fiber cloths for cleaning offer versatility for all your cleaning needs.
description: Product Description TDBS Microfibre Roll Cloths - Pack of 50 These premium microfibre towels effectively trap dust, absorb spills, and remove dirt without leaving streaks or residue. Mutipurpose Microfibre Roll Cloths - Pack of 50 Ideal for cleaning kitchens, bathrooms, glass surfaces, electronics, car interiors, and furniture , these machine-washable microfibre cloths offer long-lasting use. Previous page Dispense Cloths Easily Easy Tear-Off Design The convenient roll format allows for quick and effortless dispensing , making cleaning faster. 100% Microfibre Super Absorbent Made from 100% microfibre , these cloths quickly absorb water, dust, and grease. Store Anywhere Compact Design The microfibre cloth roll is easy to store in kitchen drawers, under sinks, or in a car compartment. Next page 1 Easy Tear-Off Design 2 Super Absorbent 3 Compact Design Multipurpose Microfibre Roll Cloths Experience Premium Cleaning with Our TDBS Microfibre Roll Cloths! Tackle any cleaning task with Microfibre Roll Cloth, a multipurpose cleaning essential designed to effortlessly remove dust, dirt, and spills. This pack includes 50 premium microfibre sheets (30cm x 30cm each) that offer superior absorbency, durability, and a streak-free finish. Whether you're cleaning the kitchen, bathroom, car, electronics, or furniture, these lint-free microfibre cloths ensure a spotless surface every time. Are these microfibre cloths disposable or reusable? These microfibre cloths are completely reusable! Simply wash them after use to extend their lifespan and enjoy cleaning. Can I use these cloths for cleaning car interiors and exteriors? Absolutely! These car microfibre cleaning cloths are perfect for detailing car interiors, polishing dashboards, wiping windows, and drying exteriors without scratching the surface. Will these cloths leave streaks or lint on glass and mirrors? No, these lint-free microfibre towels provide a streak-free shine, making them ideal for glass, mirrors, and high-shine surfaces. How do I wash and care for these microfibre cloths? To maintain their effectiveness, wash the microfibre cleaning cloths in warm water with mild detergent, and avoid fabric softeners as they can reduce absorbency. Can these be used for kitchen cleaning and dish drying? Yes! These super absorbent microfibre cloths are perfect for drying dishes, wiping spills, and cleaning countertops in the kitchen.
